articles.title: NASA Invites Public to Share Thrill of Mars Perseverance Rover Landing - NASA
articles.description: NASA is inviting the public to take part in virtual activities and events as the agency’s Mars 2020 Perseverance rover nears entry, descent, and landing on the Red Planet, with touchdown scheduled for approximately 3:55 p.m. EST Thursday, Feb. 18.
